TextView.android:text:
Help: 
 
To start a new canvas press the pink + button in the bottom 
 right corner of the main screen. 
 
To seach for a saved canvas, press the magnifying glass icon on the main screen and then enter in the name of the canvas to the search bar. 
 
To start drawing on your new canvas, just use your finger to start drawing! 
 
To change your brush type, press the drop-down menu on the top right of the canvas and select the type of brush you want to draw with. 
 
To change the color of your brush, press the paint can icon and select a color from the color wheel. 
 
To pan around the canvas, press the 4 arrows icon and then use your finger to move around the canvas. Press the button again to resume drawing. 
 
To erase any part of your drawing, press the button with the eraser icon and then use your finger to erase any mistakes you have made! 
 
Have fun drawing!
